title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 275.1 - Designation of arbitrator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 275.1 - Designation of arbitrator

State Regulations

With the approval of one or more members of the Board of

Mediation, the executive secretary or, in the event of his absence or
disability, the assistant to the executive secretary, or such other person as
may be specially authorized by the board to do so, may select and designate the
arbitrator in any matter which the parties voluntarily agree to submit for
arbitration to the Board of Mediation, or to a designee of the Board of

Mediation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
275.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
